original_title: Asiri Port City Hospital (Pvt) Ltd recognized  as a primary business of strategic importance
original_body_lines: The Cabinet of Ministers approved the proposal presented by the President in his capacity as the Minister of Investment Promotion to grant relevant exemptions or incentives to Asiri Port City Hospital (Pvt) Ltd to implement a project to develop a hospital in the port city of Colombo under an investment of USD 100 million.

The project qualifies for exemptions or incentives under 2(b) of Colombo Port City (Guidelines on the Grant of Exemptions or Incentives to Businesses of Strategic Importance) Regulations, No. 2 of 2023.
